Implications from this confirms a few things:1) UMNO is 100% behind this as the address is used as Pembantah's address and saksi2) PDRM is seemingly involved and protecting the gang? (not confirmed)3) Yes, mass bantahans are occuring without valid reasons.4) SPR officers wanted to silence the media and took photographs of whoever demands their RM100 compensation5) UMNO people are sitting at the SPR counter and having same voter list with SPRhttps://www.facebook.com/BERSIH2.0OFFICIAL/...368003313238415hNaYvUHa1NU

READ the article before commenting. Of course you can bantah with VALID reason, but UMNO is doing these "MASS BANTAHAN" with filmsy reason like "alamat tidak dikesan" or even "pemilih diragui"...... and they refuse to pay the RM100 compensation for filing false bantahan! the whole issue is false bantahan and wasting these young people's time and denying their constitutional right to vote.and explain why SPR and PDRM is protecting them!The system right now puts the burden on proving one's eligibility on innocent young voters instead of SPR doing things like a fucking Google Maps search to see whether their alamat exists or not

You see nothing wrong because you never bother to read any of the articles!Of course you can bantah with VALID reason, but UMNO is doing these "MASS BANTAHAN"...... and they refuse to pay the RM100 compensation for filing false bantahan! the whole issue is false bantahan and wasting these young people's time and denying their constitutional right to vote.and explain why SPR and PDRM is protecting them!Explain why they have the exact same list as SPR and even sitting in front of the counter with them!explain why they need to chase out the media!READ THE ARTICLES
think u can leave PDRM out of this.just because they choose to be independent of this, doesnt mean they are complicit.

wtf are you taking about..Which part are PDRM and SPR protecting them..THey are doing it according to law.You bantah, SPR keluar surat, the voter comes in and makes his case. SPR find the bantahan invalid, the fine is paid.At no point the article mention about SPR protecting them.See, if you want that RM 100, go after UMNO directly through court or SPR if there  are provisions stating SPR needs to follow up on the fine ...Also, which part is PDRM protecting them ??They are just sitting there.It is clear, some people in Bersih and Selangor state government (DAP) are just paranoid regarding this.Instead of helping these voters recover that RM 100 from UMNO, they are bad mouthing SPR....
I'm not sure. If you read the youth's account, the police were protecting them as if they knew what was happening. In any case, I'll amend the title to avoid being called by the Special Branch

Explain why they are sitting at the SPR counter and cosying up with the officers then? and they even possess the same lists and documents as SPR which they shouldn't have.Which part of SPR is protecting them? I'd suggest you read up more first. For starters, them ignoring any pleas of help and photographing anybody who demands the RM100 compensation. The SPR is supposed to protect the voters not sit there and do nothing. Did you know that the judge even knows that the bantahans were invalid? Read the youth's account and observation.The law states pembantah must pay the voters directly, not through any 3rd party or UMNO. That is the crux of the issue. SPR officers even admitted that but did nothing. is this not proof of SPR protecting them??and DAP was never mentioned in the articles. not even once.as for PDRM, if you read the youth's account, it implies that they knew exactly what was going on and the UMNO people was hiding behind them.I'm sure doing these mass bantahan and denying constitutional right to vote is not a conspiracy and we are just being paranoid.

Both. and the bigger issue here is the mass bantahan that is happening, and if you follow the developments, 95% of people that kena is young Chinese voters. Incidentally, pembantahs were all UMNO members. personal experience: I registered the same address with my parents and siblings. Why did I kena bantah when SPR should have my address in their database?So this issue is not so simple anymore. All fingers points towards a ploy to deny voters constitutional rights. and read this illogical statement and tell me what do you think of the validity of the pembantahs. Which begs the question, did UMNO did this delibrately and without valid reason? Look. If you have read the articles (which I'm sure you have not), then you'll realize that the objectors knew the address were valid but they bantah anyways. Is this clean in your eyes? To deny people from voting without valid reason? and explain why 95% of the people who got objected were a single race? And explain why they never paid their penalty? thankful? are you kidding me? thankful because thousands of people just wasted one whole day of their working/student life to attend this illogical investigation?

its obvious you don't know what's going on. read the articles before commenting further, thank you. FYI, individuals can bantah people, not parties or agencies. This is the opposite of a clean and fair election

and you are blaming SPR and PDRM for it?UMNO mass bantahan = RM 100 fine for every failed bantahan.They do 1 million bantahan = RM 100 million in fines.It is their democratic right to do it. Regardless what the issue is. Just like You can bantah any name in the electoral list.You come from SG ke, UK ke, US ke, it is up to you....Your choice to be there and meet SPR....No one force you too. Worst case, your kids name wont be in the list. If being in the list and voting is worth more to you than the cost of travelling. Go to SPR office.Go blame UMNO for their practice. Better yet, sue them to recover your kids cost....Stop playing victim card. It is getting absurd. Especially after the 400k bangla voting episode.....

I really don't get your logic. SPR is accepting these invalid bantahans and you are telling us not to blame them?Victim card? do you really not care that people are wasting their precious time and money over something that isn't valid in the first place?? being in the voting list is our constitutional right! no one forcing us to go? you do know that without these invalid bantahan people can happily move on with their life? If SPR would even check whether the addresses exist then none of this would have happened. Damn right we are blaming SPR. so that's what all this is about. you are letting your hatred over the 400k bangla thing and clouding your vision from what's in front of you. Truth to be damned IDGAF about things that are irrelevant to this issue.
Bantah biarlah batah pandai pandai.Waste everyone money n time. Apa lancau democratic when compensation RM100 pun tak mampu.  Pui.

Actually I don't really care whether Pakatan or whoever wins the election. But what they are doing is wasting the time and money thousands of innocent youths to clear their name for no reason and denying their constitutional right to register and vote.I had to wake up at 6am to beat the morning jam to shah Alam and pay freaking rm6 for parking. And they refuse to compensate us. Please la, I don't know why they want to do this yet don't pay up. Wanna play dirty then do the whole act, people won't viral this if they didnt act so obvious. God.SPR must be held responsible for letting this nonsense happen.

It's a waste of time but it's a one-off problem that can be easily solved. What you should do if you're unhappy is to make sure UMNO or whatever party those objectors belong to actually pay the fine.

Yes i got a friend that kena this one. When check the voters status said invalid, kena bantah. From one Malay auntie that she never know, never heard off, doesnt even stay near her house. Then she need take leave to mahkamah this & that. Waste time waste money.If not SPR pakat with UMNO release the young voter's namelist, I duno how an ordinary Malay auntie can get those info? She said many like her also at the mahkamah, mostly young Chinese voters waiting to appeal the bantahan.

Look, get off your BERSIH hate here because this issue has nothing to do with their past mistakes or stuff. With thousands of witnesses, this case is confirmed as valid. If you don't think SPR should be blamed for letting THOUSANDS of INVALID objections, then you are being ridiculous. SPR's job is to ensure that our elections are fair and carried out in a democratic way. These BASELESS AND INVALID mass bantahans are abusing the bantahan process and dragging thousands of people into wasting their time and money. The very fact that SPR doesn't care that UMNO members are acting like bosses in the SPR office itself is fucking shameful and they should be ridiculed and held responsible.Who the fuck cares about banglas? Did I mention anything about that? Stop blinding yourself over different issues.

I disagree. The very fact that UMNO is intentionally objecting and abusing the system with INVALID reasons is infringing on the democratic process. It is a willful intention to commit false bantahan, and SPR is not doing anything to stop it. Besides, if you follow the developments, SPR and UMNO are colluding. How is it possible that UMNO objectors are sitting together with the SPR officers?

A bunch of my friends including myself has now noticed that our names and voter registration status are completely gone from SPR's website and database. Well done, corrupted piece of shit SPR.Still getting amused by people defending SPR saying everything is fine and dandy.
